Headline: #49 Western and #X49 Western Express Temporary Reroute near Western/34th
ShortDescription: #49 Western, #X49 Western Exp. buses rerouted NB: Western, 35th, Western Blvd., and Western; SB: Western, 31st, California, 35th, and Western near Western/34th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western and #X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Western/34th due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Western, 35th, Western Blvd., and Western.

Southbound buses will operate via Western, 31st, California, 35th, and Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near 59th/Cicero
ShortDescription: Southbound 54B South Cicero buses temp. rerouted via Midway Orange Line, 59th, cicero, 55th, Pulaski, 63rd, and cicero due to, street blockage near 59th/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Midway Orange Line, 59th, cicero, 55th, Pulaski, 63rd, and cicero due to, street blockage near 59th/Cicero.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
